title: FS or FT:  T204 Ramly HOFers J. Collins/C. Griffith

posts.post_title: FS or FT:  T204 Ramly HOFers J. Collins/C. Griffith
posts.post_content:
I recently picked up a small lot of Ramly HOFers including these two.  One is a dupe.  I would be interested in trading these for other pre-ww1 HOFers (Ramly or others).  No T206.  If you have any interest, let me know.

F/B scans available.  I will post a front scan in my Sell/Trade Album on my profile page.

GRIFFITH has been sold.

Thanks.

[IMG]http://i152.photobucket.com/albums/s172/hrbaker/BST/RAMLYS.jpg[/IMG]

One and only bump.
Griffith has been sold, Collins still available.
